org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc

Interface RiverFlow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OneShotRiverFlow, SimpleRiverFlow, TableRiverFlow

    public interface RiverFlow
extends Runnable
    RiverFlow fluent API The RiverFlow is the abstraction to the thread which performs data fetching from the river source and transports it to the river mouth
    Author:
    JÃ¶rg Prante
